text: Nabiyow Yallak meesita marah ken Rabbih xaqul too edde yabne Adduny√¢ Bilhadak kayrih taysem Siinih warsoo? keenik ixxic, jannootay weeqaytitte guba kak gexxa-lon, usun teetil waarak, Agabuy Qaboolaa (mayangalii kee xalay Sarure kinnuk) kee wasookaay cal umaanek Saytunnoowe teetil-lon, wohuk inkih tayseemih Yallak kacanuu kee leeda-lon, Yalli isi Naqoosah caaloota yaaxigeeh ken taamoomi yaba-li kinni
